name: Chargie the Bot
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 39.  The theme was "Running out of power".  Move Chargie with the WASD keys or the arrow keys.  Pick up energy, avoid mines and escape each room.

Source code is here: https://github.com/pacificyost/LD39

Tools used:

Gamemaker Studio 2 - Engine

Piskel - Pixel art

Gimp - Darkness overlay with blended shadow

Bfxr - Sound fx
